1. "It's a pity": Zelensky says Trump gave Putin what he wanted  Axios
  2. Zelenskyy says Trump's Alaska summit 'gave Putin what he wanted'  ABC News
  3. Zelenskyy: Victory is when Ukraine is not fully occupied, which is Putin's goal  LIGA.net
  4. Ukraine’s Fate Decides Europe’s Security, Warns President Zelenskyy  UNITED24 Media
  5. Zelenskyy reaffirms Ukraine will not cede territory, calls for binding security guarantees  Anadolu Ajansı
